summary: This document is an internal email regarding the agenda for a meeting related to Jeffrey Epstein. It includes instructions for preparing a professional version of the agenda on company letterhead and outlines topics to be discussed in the meeting, such as entity transfer and position updates.

persons.name: Caroline V. Kitidis
persons.context: Caroline Kitidis is coordinating the preparation of the meeting agenda and is responsible for ensuring it is professionally presented.

persons.context: Tazia Smith is involved in the communication regarding the meeting agenda and has made revisions to it.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is also copied on the email, suggesting she is part of the team working on the meeting agenda.

Caroline Kitidis and Paul Morris are both involved in the meeting preparations.
Tazia Smith and Vahe Stepanian are part of the same team working on the meeting agenda.

events.title: JE Meeting
events.description: A meeting scheduled to discuss the agenda items related to Jeffrey Epstein, including entity transfer and position updates.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email regarding a meeting agenda related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Caroline V. Kitidis is tasked with preparing a professional version of the agenda.
The meeting is scheduled for October 22, 2013, and will cover entity transfers and position updates.
Several employees from Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. are involved in the preparation of the meeting.
